name: photo-shop
description: A photo shop, not to be confused with Photoshop ;)

scripts.bd:cf-workers: set -x; npm run build:cf-workers; npm run deploy:cf-workers;
scripts.build:cf-workers: set -x; find cloudflare/ -name "wrangler.toml" -exec sh -c 'S="$(dirname "${1}")"; D="_${S}"; npx rollup "${S}/main.js" --file "${D}/_main.js";' tmp-sh '{}' \;
scripts.deploy:cf-workers: set -x; find cloudflare/ -name "wrangler.toml" -exec sh -c 'S="$(dirname "${1}")"; D="_${S}"; cp "${S}/wrangler.toml" "${D}"; npx wrangler deploy "${D}/_main.js";' tmp-sh '{}' \;

author: Joey C. DiGiorgio
